title: More Still on Joe Marino, Sue Benford and the Carbon Dating of the Shroud of Turin
post:
It’s amusing to recall that Jull writes in his recent paper:
“an excellent objective technical description of the shroud, its possible origins and weaving technologies, is given by Tyrer (1981).”
author: domenico
